directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat; saute onion and bell pepper until softened, 5 to 10 minutes. Add zucchini, water, tomato paste, garlic, and oregano; cover skillet and simmer over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until zucchini is softened and transparent, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Zucchini "Ratatouille"
